title: Loading
content:
Loading Has to reload in order to be fired again. Hand CrossbowsHeavy CrossbowsLight Crossbows

Loading is a Weapon Property in Baldur's Gate 3. Loading grants weapons the ability to be reloaded between shots. Weapon Properties grant different weapon types, diverse features that are intrinsic to that specific weapon type.

Loading Information

Has to reload in order to be fired again.

Weapon types that have Loading

Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Light Crossbows
